name: Dichotomy (itch)
description:
An actual GB game for the GameBoy !

Dichotomy is a simple game : there's no combat, no menus, not even any dialogue. I wanted to try and see how much graphics I could cram into a small GB game. Couldn't manage any music, but seeing how I can't compose anyway that might be for the best.

There's a slight narrative to the world, that you can interpret as you wish. But it's mostly about what questions you can start asking yourself.

If you want a goal : there's a secret hidden map I'm not showing in the screenshots, can you find it ?
